text:
Open-Source Contributor | UNPAID | REMOTE

Ok, it's not exactly a job, but if you're in between jobs currently, and want to add another github contribution under your belt, or just get your hands dirty - why not contribute to an open-source project?

I'm looking for contributors to AlephBet[0] + Gimel[1] - open source A/B testing client + backend running on AWS Lambda.

More details at https://github.com/Alephbet/gimel/issues/2

Languages / Skills: Javascript, Python, Frontend (CSS/HTML), Maths / Statistics knowledge highly desirable.

[0] https://github.com/Alephbet/alephbet

[1] https://github.com/Alephbet/gimel
